de.tu_dresden.psy.efml

Class StringEscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tu_dresden.psy.efml.StringEscape

  • public class StringEscape
extends java.lang.Object
    provides static functions that escape strings and a function that generates java script code to hide an integer
    Author:
    immanuel
